name: jsforce_downloader
description: Extract report data from Salesforce. Download more than 2000 rows, asynchronously. Report is downloaded by slicing it using a standard date filter field to use for a date range. For example - Case.CreatedDate to download Case reports by date of case creation. This supports Tabular, Summary and Matrix.
author: Divya Mahajan <dvm@vanmahajan.com> (http://vanmahajan.github.io)
